entity.name: Paul Manafort
entity.description: Donald Trump's former campaign manager, Paul Manafort

text:
In Lompoc federal prison not far from my district, 70% of inmates have COVID-19.

But it is Paul Manafort, Trump crony, who gets to serve his sentence at home due to coronavirus.

In Bill Barr’s Department, how can anyone have confidence that justice is being done? https://t.co/DNTtdfWi2n
